name: Stumble Guys
description:
Race against other players in online multiplayer, dashing through chaotic obstacle courses. Run, fall, rise, run again! Zip by your opponents and watch them eat your dust!

Stumble past each and every elimination round to be the last player standing and snatch the victory!

  • Battle Royale online multiplayer
  • Physics-based havoc
  • A blast of color for your eyeballs
  • Unlockable outfits and emotes to make you stand out in the crowd
  • Endless possibilities for failure! The fun kind!
